mapper.insert: insert into animul.notice values ( null, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, now(), #{member_id}, #{notice_category}, #{notice_status} )
mapper.select: select * from animul.notice n where notice_status='진행중' order by notice_id desc
select * from animul.notice n where notice_status='예정' order by notice_id desc
select * from (select row_number() over(order by notice_id desc) notice_no, n.* from notice n) n2 where n2.notice_no between ${start} and ${end}
